EmailTemplate.name: ViewSonic
EmailTemplate.subject: GREAT DEALS on the ViewSonic IFP5550 Advanced 55" Ultra HD ViewBoard Interactive Flat Panel
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Featuring Ultra HD resolution and an immersive touchscreen, the ViewSonic ViewBoard IFP5550 delivers incredible collaborative capabilities modern boardrooms and classrooms. With astonishing touch capabilities, this interactive flat panel lets multiple users write or draw on the screen with their fingers and styluses.
ViewSonic IFP5550 Advanced 55" Ultra HD ViewBoard Interactive Flat Panel
Features
• 20-point Multi-touch Interactive Screen capability.
• Ultra HD Resolution (3840 x 2160 4K)
• Floating Pen - Annotation on Demand
• Qwizdom Oktopus and Ximbus Solutions
• Built-in ARM Quad-core CPU with 16GB Storage Out-of-Box Collaboration
• ViewBoard Interactive Annotation Software (Free Download Available)
• Out-of-Box Collaboration
• 3-year limited warranty on parts, labor and backlight, onsite warranty
https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=30&v=I6Xbw4mRGXk
Call me for the latest pricing!
If you ever have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to call me. I am here to assist you with anything you may need and I look forward to speaking with you.
Warm Regards,
{!User.Name}, Technology Account Manager
{!User.Email}, (888)707-7040 ext. {!User.ISO_Extension__c}
https://business.officedepot.com
